CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Meridian Academy relative to Aethelgard School of Arts?
SRP.A: Meridian Academy is {above} Aethelgard School of Arts in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Zenith Institute of Technology relative to Arcane University?
SRP.A: Zenith Institute of Technology is {above} Arcane University in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Aethelgard School of Arts relative to Meridian Academy?
SRP.A: Aethelgard School of Arts is {below} Meridian Academy in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total student-teacher ratio?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Borealis Graduate School}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total student-teacher ratio?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Celestial College}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Arcane University's minimum Student-Teacher Ratio in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Arcane University's minimum Student-Teacher Ratio is in {1967}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Zenith Institute of Technology's minimum Student-Teacher Ratio in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Zenith Institute of Technology's minimum Student-Teacher Ratio is in {1963}.

NC.Q: Between 1968 and 1975, was the average total Student-Teacher Ratio higher or lower than between 1964 and 1967?
NC.A: The average total student-teacher ratio between 1968 and 1975 was {higher} than between 1964 and 1967.

NC.Q: Was the total Student-Teacher Ratio in 1968 higher or lower than in 1973?
NC.A: The total student-teacher ratio in 1968 was {lower} than in 1973.

NC.Q: Between 1970 and 1973, did the total Student-Teacher Ratio experience a larger or smaller change than between 1967 and 1971?
NC.A: The change in total student-teacher ratio between 1970 and 1973 was {smaller} than between 1967 and 1971.

NC.Q: Was the total Student-Teacher Ratio in 1969 higher or lower than in 1974?
NC.A: The total student-teacher ratio in 1969 was {lower} than in 1974.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Borealis Graduate School} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Aethelgard School of Arts and Borealis Graduate School first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Aethelgard School of Arts and Borealis Graduate School did not exchange leading positions.
